languages.text: "Эта... нелюдь, принявшая облик старика, атаковала меня. Я не знаю, что это, но это не человек и не псайкер, нечто иное. Его сила враждебна и чужда мне, словно тень, что затмевает сияние хаотических энергий Имматериума. Я не мог прочесть мысли этой мерзости, а оно... кажется, я для него был не менее странным, чем оно для меня. И оно напало. Всякая странность есть угроза".

"That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I do not know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."
languages.original_text: "Эта... нелюдь, принявшая облик старика, атаковала меня. Я не знаю, что это, но это не человек и не псайкер, нечто иное. Его сила враждебна и чужда мне, словно тень, что затмевает сияние хаотических энергий Имматериума. Я не мог прочесть мысли этой мерзости, а оно... кажется, я для него был не менее странным, чем оно для меня. И оно напало. Всякая странность есть угроза".

Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."

"That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I don't know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power does not come from the warp, I would even... say it is inimical to the warp, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts, and it... seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. And it attacked. Any strangeness is a threat."

Its power does not come from the warp, I would even... say it is inimical to the warp, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts, and it... seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. And it attacked. Any strangeness is a threat."

"That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I do not know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."

languages.text: «Esa... cosa tomó la forma de un anciano y me atacó. No sé lo que es, pero no es ni humano ni psíquico. Es algo distinto. Su poder me resulta desconocido y hostil, como una sombra que oscurece el brillo de las energías caóticas del Inmaterio. No conseguí leer los pensamientos de la abominación... y pareció encontrarme tan extraño como ella me resultaba a mí. Por tanto, atacó, pues todo lo desconocido es una amenaza».
languages.original_text: "That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I do not know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."

traits.locale_text: «Esa... cosa tomó la forma de un anciano y me atacó. No sé lo que es, pero no es ni humano ni psíquico. Es algo distinto. Su poder no proviene de la disformidad; diría incluso que es... opuesto a la disformidad, como una sombra que oscurece el brillo de las energías caóticas del Inmaterio. No conseguí leer los pensamientos de la abominación... y pareció encontrarme tan extraño como ella me resultaba a mí. Por tanto, atacó, pues todo lo desconocido es una amenaza».

languages.text: 「あれは…老人の姿で襲い掛かってきた。正体は分からないが、人間でも異能者でもない。別の何かだ。あの力は異質で私と相反するものとさえ言える。そう、まるで非物質世界の乱雑なエネルギーの輝きを覆い隠す影のようなものだ。あの忌まわしきものの思考は読みとれなかった…そしてアレは、私が違和感を抱くように、アレも私に対して違和感を抱いたようだ。それで襲われた。違和感というものは脅威だからな」
languages.original_text: "That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I do not know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."

traits.locale_text: 「あれは…老人の姿で襲い掛かってきた。正体は分からないが、人間でも異能者でもない。別の何かだ。あの力は歪みを源にしているものではない…<歪み>と相反するものとさえ言える。そう、まるで非物質世界の乱雑なエネルギーの輝きを覆い隠す影のようなものだ。あの忌まわしきものの思考は読みとれなかった…そしてアレは、私が違和感を抱くように、アレも私に対して違和感を抱いたようだ。それで襲われた。違和感というものは脅威だからな」

languages.text: “那个……东西变成了老人的样子，袭击了我。我也不知道那究竟是什么，但它既不是人类，也不是灵能者，而是某种截然不同的东西。它的力量与我格格不入，仿佛某种阴影，掩盖了亚空间混沌能量的光芒。我没办法探查到那只怪物的思想……而且，我在它眼里似乎也同样陌生，于是它发起了袭击，因为一切陌生的东西都意味着威胁。”
languages.original_text: "That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I do not know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."

traits.locale_text: “那个……东西变成了老人的样子，袭击了我。我也不知道那是什么东西，但它既不是人类，也不是灵能者，而是某种截然不同的东西。它的力量根本不是来自亚空间，我甚至可以说它……它的存在会阻滞亚空间。它就像某种阴影，掩盖了亚空间混沌能量的光芒。我没办法探查到那只怪物的思想……而且，我在它眼里似乎也同样陌生，于是它发起了袭击，因为一切陌生的东西都意味着威胁。”

languages.text: "Dieses ... Ding hat die Gestalt eines alten Mannes angenommen und mich attackiert. Ich weiß nicht, was es ist, doch es ist weder ein Mensch noch ein Psioniker. Es ist etwas anderes. Seine Kraft ist fremd und mir gegenüber ... feindselig, wie ein Schatten, der den Glanz der chaotischen Energien des Immateriums verdeckt. Ich konnte die Gedanken dieser Abscheulichkeit lesen ... Und sie schien mich keinen Deut weniger fremdartig zu finden als ich sie. Darum hat sie angegriffen, denn alles Fremde ist eine Gefahr."
languages.original_text: "That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I do not know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses ... Ding hat die Gestalt eines alten Mannes angenommen und mich attackiert. Ich weiß nicht, was es ist, doch es ist weder ein Mensch noch ein Psioniker. Es ist etwas anderes. Seine Kraft entspringt nicht dem Warp, ich würde sogar sagen, sie ist dem Warp gegenüber ... feindlich, wie ein Schatten, der den Glanz der chaotischen Energien des Immateriums verdeckt. Ich konnte die Gedanken dieser Abscheulichkeit lesen ... Und sie schien mich keinen Deut weniger fremdartig zu finden als ich sie. Darum hat sie angegriffen, denn alles Fremde ist eine Gefahr."

languages.text: « Cette... horreur a pris l'apparence d'un vieillard avant de m'attaquer. J'ignore ce que c'est, mais ce n'est ni un humain ni un psyker. C'est autre chose. Son pouvoir m'est étranger et hostile, comme une ombre qui voilerait la radiance des énergies chaotiques de l'Immaterium. Je n'ai pas réussi à lire dans les pensées de cette abomination... et elle a eu l'air tout aussi interpellée par mon étrangeté que moi par la sienne. C'est pour cette raison qu'elle s'en est prise à moi, l'inconnu est toujours perçu comme une menace. »
languages.original_text: "That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I do not know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."

traits.locale_text: « Cette... horreur a pris l'apparence d'un vieillard avant de m'attaquer. J'ignore ce que c'est, mais ce n'est ni un humain ni un psyker. C'est autre chose. Son pouvoir ne vient pas du Warp, et je dirais même qu'il lui est... hostile, comme une ombre qui voilerait la radiance des énergies chaotiques de l'Immaterium. Je n'ai pas réussi à lire dans les pensées de cette abomination... et elle a eu l'air tout aussi interpellée par mon étrangeté que moi par la sienne. C'est pour cette raison qu'elle s'en est prise à moi, l'inconnu est toujours perçu comme une menace. »

languages.text: "O... Şey, ihtiyar bir adam suretine bürünerek bana saldırdı. Ne olduğunu bilmiyorum ama ne insan ne de ruhsezer. Başka bir şey. Gücü, Tindiyar'ın kaotik enerjilerinin parıltısını saklayan bir gölge misali yabancı ve düşmanlıkla dolu. Ucubenin düşüncelerini okumayı başaramadım ve... Tıpkı onun bana tuhaf gelmesi gibi ben de ona tuhaf gelmişim gibi hissettim. Bu yüzden saldırdı. Zira tüm tuhaflıklar tehdit teşkil eder."
languages.original_text: "That... thing took the shape of an old man and attacked me. I do not know what it is, but it is neither human nor a psyker. It is something else. Its power is foreign and inimical to me, like a shadow that obscures the shine of the Immaterium's chaotic energies. I was unable to read the abomination's thoughts... and it seemed to find me no less strange than how strange it was to me. Thus, it attacked, for any strangeness is a threat."
